channel.title: Abouts on measured.
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on measured.

item.title: about
item.description: I’ve moved house twice in the last year and it’s taken a toll. In the meantime, I’m still working on my doctorate in, for want of a formal term, statistical data science. A tidy statistician, perhaps. I need to muster all my tools for keeping sane as I weather the aftershocks of the housing crisis with this newfound stabiltiy. I think blogging daily will help me organise my thoughts. I suspect it’ll be too introspective to be worth subscribing to.

item.title: about
item.description: I’ve moved house twice in the last year and it’s taken a toll. In the meantime, I’m still working on my doctorate in, for want of a formal term, statistical data science metaresearch. A tidy statistician, perhaps. I need to muster all my tools for keeping sane as I weather the aftershocks of the housing affordability crisis with this newfound stabiltiy. I think blogging daily regularly will help me organise my thoughts.
